About Sean

I am a marketer and growth hacker living in San Francisco and working at LinkedIn.

I was born in a small town in northeast PA, a.k.a. “NEPA” (pronounced nee-pa). In 2012, the population of my hometown was 1,582. Since then, I’ve mostly lived in bigger towns. I currently live in San Francisco, and I love it here.

I am a product marketer on the growth team at LinkedIn. In 2011, I taught myself to code and built my first side-project, Shoflow.

When I’m not hacking away on the internet, I try to spend my time learning new things. I’m currently learning how to speak Chinese and play guitar.

Say hello! sean@seanoliver.me
